SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, invoice_month, invoice_xml_data, deleted, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_html, invoice_csv, afa_invoice_data_id, filename, directory_name FROM afa.elp_afa_invoice_data WHERE afa_invoice_data_id = :afa_invoice_data_id
SQL.LOAD_ACTIVE_INVOICE:
SELECT dealer_id, invoice_month, invoice_xml_data, deleted, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, invoice_html, invoice_csv, afa_invoice_data_id, filename, directory_name
FROM afa.elp_afa_invoice_data WHERE DELETED = 'N' and dealer_id = :dealer_id and INVOICE_MONTH = :invoice_month
SQL.LOAD_DEALER_INVOICE_DATA: select Invoice_xml_data from afa.ELP_AFA_INVOICE_DATA WHERE DELETED = 'N' and dealer_id = :dealer_id and INVOICE_MONTH = :invoice_month
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE afa.elp_afa_invoice_data SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, invoice_month = :invoice_month, invoice_xml_data = :invoice_xml_data, deleted = :deleted, invoice_html = :invoice_html, invoice_csv = :invoice_csv, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE afa_invoice_data_id = :afa_invoice_data_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO afa.elp_afa_invoice_data ( dealer_id, invoice_month, invoice_xml_data, deleted, created_by, invoice_html, invoice_csv, afa_invoice_data_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :invoice_month, :invoice_xml_data, :deleted, :created_by, :invoice_html, :invoice_csv, :afa_invoice_data_id )
